todos.content: Fix mmry Requires→Wants in usermgr (done in code)
Enhance usermgr delete-user: stop services, kill processes, remove socket, remove home dir
Wire admin delete_user handler to call usermgr delete-user for Linux cleanup
Add oqtoctl admin command for bulk cleanup of orphaned Linux users
Clean up orphaned users on octo-azure (peter, waldmensch, etc.)
Update all existing runner services on octo-azure: Requires→Wants
